history.proof: intros s z H. induction s. - simpl in *. contradiction. - hauto lq: on use: exds_card_Ds_inf unfold: Rs.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> Rs (Ds s z) s

Premises:
Rs = fun sy sx : set => (card sy < card sx)%nat : set -> set -> Prop
Ds = fix Ds (s : set) (z : dart) {struct s} : set := match s with | Vs => Vs | Is s0 x => if eq_dart_dec x z then Ds s0 z else Is (Ds s0 z) x end : set -> dart -> set
dart = nat : Set
Inductive set : Set := Vs : set | Is : set -> dart -> set
exds = fix exds (s : set) (z : dart) {struct s} : Prop := match s with | Vs => False | Is s0 x => x = z \/ exds s0 z end : set -> dart -> Prop
not_exds_card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z -> card (Ds s z) = card s
exds_card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> card (Ds s z) = (card s - 1)%nat
exds_card_Ds_inf : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> (card (Ds s z) < card s)%nat
exds_Ds_exds : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), exds (Ds s x) z -> exds s z
not_exds_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds (Ds s z) z
not_exds_Ds_bis : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), ~ exds s z -> ~ exds (Ds s x) z
exds_Ds : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), x <> z -> exds s z < -> exds (Ds s x) z
Ds_s : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z < -> Ds s z = s
not_exds_diff : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z -> forall t : dart, exds s t -> z <> t
exds_Ds_diff : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), exds (Ds s x) z -> x <> z
card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), (card (Ds s z) <= card s)%nat
exds_dec : forall (s : set) (z : dart), {exds s z} + {~ exds s z}
exds_card_pos : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> (0 < card s)%nat
Acc_set : forall s : set, Acc Rs s
not_exds_Vs : forall s : set, (forall z : dart, ~ exds s z) -> s = Vs
set_rec : forall P : set -> Set, P Vs -> (forall s : set, P s -> forall d : dart, P (Is s d)) -> forall s : set, P s
set_ind : forall P : set -> Prop, P Vs -> (forall s : set, P s -> forall d : dart, P (Is s d)) -> forall s : set, P s
set_rect : forall P : set -> Type, P Vs -> (forall s : set, P s -> forall d : dart, P (Is s d)) -> forall s : set, P s
sumbool_rec : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Set), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
sumbool_ind : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
set_minus_s_Ds : forall (s1 s2 : set) (x : dart), ~ exds s1 x -> exds s2 x -> set_minus s1 (Ds s2 x) = set_minus s1 s2
exds_set_minus : forall (s1 s2 : set) (z : dart), exds s1 z -> ~ exds s2 z -> exds (set_minus s1 s2) z
card = fix card (s : set) : nat := match s with | Vs => 0%nat | Is s0 x => if exds_dec s0 x then card s0 else (1 + card s0)%nat end : set -> nat
not_exds_set_minus : forall (s1 s2 : set) (z : dart), exds s2 z -> ~ exds (set_minus s1 s2) z
not_exds_minus : forall (s1 s2 : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s1 z -> ~ exds (set_minus s1 s2) z

```coq
intros s z H.
induction s.
- simpl in *. contradiction.
- simpl in *. destruct (eq_dart_dec x z) as [Hxz | Hxz].
  * rewrite Hxz in *. simpl. auto.
  * rewrite <- IHs in *. simpl. auto.
Qed.
```

original: intros s z H. induction s. - simpl in *. contradiction. - simpl in *. destruct (eq_dart_dec x z) as [Hxz | Hxz]. * rewrite Hxz in *. simpl. auto. * rewrite <- IHs in *. simpl. auto.
